Mesh¶

class decodes.core.dc_mesh.Mesh(vertices=None, faces=None, basis=None)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_has_pts.HasPts

a very simple mesh class

Mesh Constructor

Parameters:
  • vertices ([Point]) – The vertices of the mesh
  • faces ([int]) – List of ordered faces.
  • basis (Basis) – The (optional) basis of the mesh.

Mesh object.

Mesh

Adds a face to the mesh.

Parameters:a,b,c,d (int.) – Face to be added to the list of faces.
Returns:Modifies list of faces.

Explodes a mesh into individual faces.

Parameters:msh (Mesh) – Mesh to explode.
Returns:List of meshes.
Type :list

Parameters:index (int) – Index of a face.
Returns:The centroid of a face.
Return type:Point

Parameters:index (int) – Index of a face.
Returns:Normal vector.
Return type:Vec

Parameters:index (int) – Face’s index
Returns:Vertice.
